Keywords: Hydra , Soldier , Spy
Real Name: Ophelia Sarkissian
Special Powers
FOLLOW-UP: FREE: Once per turn for all characters with a Follow-Up trait, make an attack using Madame Hydra's printed combat values, but only to target a single character hit with an attack made by another friendly character with the Hydra keyword.
RIGHT UNDER YOUR NOSE THE WHOLE TIME: Leadership, Outwit.

muel0017
came here to see peoples take on this figure and end up reading drama in the comments, mods should remove all of those that arent about the figure. With that being said, Madame Hydra here is 6 clicks long for 45pts. Stealth and CR are always a great combo, love the leadership/outwit special power. Only thing I'm curios about is poison, maybe it's for if someone rushes her while she is in stealth and they miss and are tied up. Seems like a decent cheap figure to put on a Hydra team.
